.. _apptainer_plugin_enable:

apptainer plugin enable
-----------------------

Enable an installed Apptainer plugin

Synopsis
~~~~~~~~



  The 'plugin enable' command allows a user to enable a plugin that is already
  installed in the system and which has been previously disabled.

::

  apptainer plugin enable <name>

Examples
~~~~~~~~

::


    $ apptainer plugin enable example.org/plugin

Options
~~~~~~~

::

  -h, --help   help for enable

SEE ALSO
~~~~~~~~

* :ref:`apptainer plugin <apptainer_plugin>` 	 - Manage Apptainer plugins
